name: PhaserProject
description:
**The game has a HUGE viewport,  make sure to adjust your browser settings so you can see the whole thing, sorry for the inconvenience.

Sound effects provided by:  https://taira-komori.jpn.org/freesoundtw.html

Controls:

  • Click on the gray tiles to move yourself (the orange dot).

Goal:

  • Collect the blue dots as fast as possible, avoid the red dots.
  • Try to use as few moves as possible
